items.title: CNH and KRW Stablecoins Signal Intensifying Global Tokenization Race
items.excerpt: Two new sovereign-linked stablecoins—AnchorX’s AxCNH and BDACS’s KRW1—have debuted in major regional forums, underscoring a growing global push to tokenize fiat and reshape cross-border payments. Their structures and timing highlight both commercial ambitions and broader macroeconomic and geopolitical implications.
